page.shortlink: ux properties static html page name
page.description: The page name for the static HTML page created for Application Cache.
page.discussion: When you save the UX Component, the static HTML page and supporting files will be created in a folder called *[ui:staticHTMLFileset]* in the web project folder. The page name is used for the static HTML Page. If you specify a *[ui:blank value]* or *[ui:<Default>]*, the page name for the static HTML page will be generated using the following format:

section.description: You can optionally specify the page name. If specified, the page name will be used instead of the auto-generated name described above.
